divy12:141: atha tīrthyāmetadabhavat—kiṁ punaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ saptabhirdivasairanadhigatamadhigamiṣyati, atha vā niṣpalāyiṣyati, atha vā pakṣaparyeṣaṇaṁ kartukāmah? teṣāmetadabhavat—na hyeva śramaṇo gautamo niṣpalāyiṣyati, nāpyanadhigatamadhigamiṣyati |
divy12:144: iti viditvā raktākṣo nāma parivrājaka indrajālābhijñaḥ sa āhūtaḥ |
divy12:145: raktākṣasya parivrajakasyaitat prakaraṇaṁ vistareṇārocayanti, evaṁ cāhuh—yatkhalu raktāṣka jānīyāh—śramaṇo gautamo ’smābhiriddhyā āhūtaḥ |
divy12:146: sa kathayati—itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṁ vidarśayiṣyāmīti |
divy12:151: upasaṁkramya nānātīrthikaśramaṇabrāhmaṇacarakaparivrājakānāmetatprakaraṇaṁ vistareṇārocayati, evaṁ cāha—yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran—śramaṇo gautamo ’smābhiriddhyā āhūtaḥ |
divy12:152: sa kathayati—itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṁ vidarśāyiṣyāmīti |

divy12:160: sa kathayati—itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṁ vidarśayiṣyāmīti |

divy12:168: upasaṁkramya etatprakaraṇaṁ vistareṇārocayati, evaṁ cāha—yatkhalu subhadra jānīyāh—śramaṇo gautamo ’smābhih ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ |
divy12:169: sa kathayati—itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṁ vidarśayiṣyāmīti |
divy12:173: subhadreṇābhihitam—na śobhanaṁ bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yadyuṣmābhiḥ śramaṇo gautamo riddhyā āhūtaḥ |
divy12:174: tatkasya hetoh? mama tāvat kuśinagaryāmāvāso ’navatapte mahāsarasi divā vihāraḥ |
divy12:175: śramaṇasya gautamasya śāriputro nāma śiṣyastasya cundo nāma śrāmaṇerakastasyāpi tatraivānavatapte mahāsarasi divā vihāraḥ |
divy12:176: na tathānavataptakāyikā devatā api kārān kartavyān manyante yathā tasya |
divy12:178: ihāhaṁ kuśinagarīṁ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātamādāya anavataptaṁ mahāsarasaṁ gacchāmi |
divy12:179: tasya mamānavataptakāyikā devatā anavataptānmahāsarasaḥ pānīyamuddhṛtya ekānte na prayacchati |
divy12:181: tasyānavataptakāyikā devatā pāṁśukūlāni dhāvayitvā tena pānīyenātmānaṁ siñcati |
divy12:182: yasya tāvadvayaṁ śiṣyapratiśiṣyakayāpi na tulyāḥ, sa yuṣmābhiruttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryeṇāhūtaḥ |
divy12:183: na śobhanaṁ bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yacchramaṇo gautamo riddhiprātihāryeṇāhūtaḥ |
divy12:184: evamahaṁ jāne yathā maharddhikaḥ śramaṇo gautamo mahānubhāva iti |
divy12:189: atha rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya kālo nāṁnā bhrātā abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ |
divy12:191: anyatamayā cāvaruddhikayā prāsādatalagatayā rājakumāraṁ dṛṣṭvā sragdāmaṁ kṣiptam |
divy12:194: tai rājñe niveditam—yatkhalu deva jānīthāh—kālena devasyāntaḥpuraṁ prārthitam |
divy12:198: evaṁ deveti pauruṣeyai rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kālasya vīthīmadhye hastapādāśchinnāḥ |
divy12:199: sa ārtasvaraṁ krandate, duḥkhāṁ tīvrāṁ kharāṁ kaṭukāmamanāpāṁ devanāṁ vedayate |
divy12:202: kālasya jñātibhirabhihitam—etamāryāḥ kālaṁ rājakumāraṁ satyābhiyācanayā yathāpaurāṇaṁ kurudhvamiti |
divy12:205: atha kālasya rājakumārasyaitadabhavat—kṛcchrasaṁkaṭasambādhaprāptaṁ māṁ bhagavān na samanvāharatīti viditvā gāthāṁ bhāṣate— imāmavasthāṁ mama lokanātho na vetti saṁbādhagatasya kasmāt |
divy12:208: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma—gaccha tvamānanda saṁghāṭimādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena kālo rājabhrātā tenopasaṁkrāma |
divy12:209: upasaṁkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evaṁ vada—ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā arūpiṇo vā rūpiṇo vā saṁjñino vā asaṁjñino vā naivasaṁjñino vā nāsaṁjñinaḥ, tathāgato ’rhan samyaksambuddhasteṣāṁ sattvānāmagra ākhyāyate |
divy12:210: ye kecid dharmā asaṁskṛtā vā saṁskṛtā vā, virāgo dharmasteṣāmagra ākhyātaḥ |
divy12:211: anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṁ syāt |
divy12:212: evaṁ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṁghāṭīmādāyānyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena rājabhrātā kālastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy12:213: upasaṁkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evamāha—ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā yāvannaivasaṁjñino nāsaṁjñinaḥ, tathāgato ’rhan samyaksambuddhasteṣāṁ sattvānāmagra ākhyātaḥ |
divy12:214: ye keciddharmāḥ saṁkṛtā vā asaṁskṛtā vā, virāgo dharmasteṣāmagra ākhyātaḥ |
divy12:215: ye kecit saṁghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā parṣado vā, tathāgataśrāvakasaṁghasteṣāmagra ākhyātaḥ |
divy12:216: anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṁ bhavatu |
divy12:217: sahābhidhānāt kālasya rājakumārasya śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṁ saṁvṛttam, yathāpi tatra buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṁ ca devatānubhāvena |
divy12:218: kālena kumāreṇa tenaiva saṁvegena anāgāmiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam ṛddhiścāpi nirhṛtā |
divy12:221: yatrāsya śarīraṁ gaṇḍagaṇḍaṁ kṛtaṁ tasya gaṇḍaka ārāmika iti saṁjñā saṁvṛttā |
divy12:222: atha rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sa pravāritaḥ |
divy12:226: rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarādbhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ kāritaḥ śatasahasrahastah … caturṇāṁ maṇḍapo vitataḥ |
divy12:229: rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena saptame divase yāvajjetavanam yāvacca bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapo ’ntarāt sarvo ’sau pradeśo ’pagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyo vyavasthitaḥ |
divy12:234: atha bhagavān saptame divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya pravikṣat |
divy12:235: śrāvastīṁ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṁ pratiśrāmya bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṁ praviṣṭaḥ pratisamlayanāya |
divy12:236: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo ’nekaśataparivāro ’nekasahasraparivāro ’nekaśatasahasraparivāro yena bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy12:240: niṣadya rājānaṁ prasenajitaṁ kauśalamidamavocat—yatkhalu deva jānīyāh—ete vayamāgatāḥ |
divy12:241: kutra etarhi śramaṇo gautamah? tena bhavanto muhūrtamāgamayata |
divy12:243: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṁ māṇavamāmantrayate—ehi tvamuttra, yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāma |
divy12:244: upasaṁkramyāsmākaṁ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpābādhatāṁ ca pṛccha, alpātaṅkatāṁ ca laghūtthānatāṁ ca yātrāṁ ca balaṁ ca sukhaṁ ca anavadyatāṁ ca sparśavihāratāṁ ca |
divy12:245: evaṁ ca vada—rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha—ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṁ kālaṁ manyate |
divy12:246: evaṁ devetyuttaro māṇavo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy12:247: upasaṁkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṁ saṁmukhaṁ saṁmodanīṁ saṁrañjanīṁ vividhāṁ kathāṁ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy12:248: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa uttaro māṇavo bhagavantamidamavocat—rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate, alpābādhatāṁ ca pṛcchati alpātaṅkatāṁ ca laghūtthānatāṁ ca yātraṁ ca balaṁ ca sukhaṁ ca anavadyatāṁ ca sparśavihāratāṁ ca |
divy12:249: sukhī bhavatu māṇava prasenajit kauśalastvaṁ ca |
divy12:250: rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha—ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālaṁ manyate |
divy12:252: bhagavatā tathādhiṣṭhito yathottaro māṇavastat evoparivihāyasā prakrāntaḥ, yena rājā prasenajit kauśalastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy12:253: adrākṣīdrājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṁ māṇavakamupari vihāyasā āgacchatam |
divy12:254: dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānidamavocat—vidarśitaṁ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam |
divy12:257: kiṁ tvaṁ jñāsyasi kenaitad vidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena? atha bhagavāṁstadrūpaṁ samādhiṁ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte ’rgaḍacchidreṇārciṣo nirgatya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍape nipatitāḥ, sarvaśca prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ prajvalitaḥ |
divy12:258: adrākṣustīrthyā bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapaṁ prajvalitam, dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasenajitaṁ kauśalamidamavocat—eṣa idānīṁ mahārāja śramaṇasya gautamasya prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ prajvalitaḥ |
divy12:260: atha so ’gniraspṛṣṭa eva vāriṇā sarvaprātihāryamaṇḍapamadagdhvā svayameva nirvṛto yathāpi tadbuddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṁ ca devatānubhāvena |
divy12:261: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat—vidarśitaṁ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam |
divy12:264: kiṁ tvaṁ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena? bhagavatā kanakamarīcikāvabhāsā utsṛṣṭāḥ, yena sarvaloka udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo ’bhūt |
divy12:266: dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānāmantrayate—vidarśitaṁ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam |
divy12:269: kiṁ tvaṁ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena? bhagavatā kanakamarīcikāvabhāsā utsṛṣṭā yena sarvaloka udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo ’bhūt |
divy12:271: dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānāmantrayate—vidarśitaṁ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam |
divy12:274: kiṁ tvaṁ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena vā gautamena? gaṇḍakenārāmikauravād dvīpāt karṇikāravṛkṣamādāya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapasyāgrataḥ sthāpitaḥ |
divy12:275: ratnakenāpyārāmikena gandhamādanādaśokavṛkṣamānīya bahgavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sthāpitaḥ |
divy12:276: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat—vidarśitaṁ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam |
divy12:279: kiṁ tvaṁ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena? bhagavatā sābhisaṁskāreṇa pṛthivyāṁ pādau nyastau |
divy12:281: ayaṁ trisamāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiyaṁ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṁ kampati prakampati saṁprakampati |
divy12:291: gaganatalasthā devatā bhagavata upariṣṭāddivyānyutpalāni kṣipanti padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagarucūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi, divyāni māndārakāṇi puṣpāṇi kṣipanti, divyāni ca vāditrāṇi saṁpravādayanti, cailavikṣepaṁ cākārṣuḥ |
divy12:293: atha teṣām ṛṣīṇāmetadabhavat—kimarthaṁ mahāpṛthivīcālaḥ saṁvṛtta iti |
divy12:294: teṣāmetadabhavat—nūnamasmākaṁ sabrahmacāribhiḥ śramaṇo gautamo riddhyā āhūto bhaviṣyatīti viditvā pañca ṛṣiśatāni śrāvastīṁ saṁprasthitāni |
divy12:296: adrākṣuste ṛṣayo bhagavantaṁ dūrādeva dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṁkṛtaṁ mūrtimantamiva dharmaṁ havyāvasiktamiva hutavahaṁ kāñcanabhājanasthamiva pradīpaṁ jaṅgamamiva suvarṇaparvataṁ nānāratnavicitramiva suvarṇarūpaṁ sphuṭapaṭumahāvimalaviśuddhabuddhiṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantam |
divy12:297: dṛṣṭvā ca punar na tathā dvādaśavarṣe ’bhyastaśamatho yogācārasya cittasya kalyātām, janayati, aputrasya vā putraḥ pratilambho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṁ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko yathā tatprathamatapūrvabuddhāropitakuśalamūlānāṁ tatprathamato buddhadarśanam |
divy12:299: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte sthitāḥ |
divy12:300: ekāntasthitāste ṛṣayo bhagavantamidamavocat—labhemahi vayaṁ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy12:302: te bhagavatā brāhmeṇa svareṇāhūtāh—eta bhikṣavaścarata brahmacaryam |
divy12:303: sahābhidhānānmuṇḍāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ saṁghāṭīprāvṛtāḥ pātrakaravyagrahastāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravo varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitāḥ |
divy12:305: satya(dyah) praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṁ sthitā buddhamanorathena (2)|
divy12:306: atha bhagavān divyamānuṣyeṇa pūjāsatkāreṇa satkṛto gurukṛto māninaḥ pūjito ’rhannarhatparivāro saptabhiśca nikāyaiḥ saṁpuraskṛto mahatā ca janaughena yena prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy12:308: bhagavataḥ kāyādraśmayo nirgatya sarvaṁ prātihāryamaṇḍapaṁ suvarṇavarṇāvabhāsaṁ kṛtavatyaḥ |
divy12:309: atha lūhasudatto gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṁsamuttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṁ jānumaṇḍalaṁ pṛthivyāṁ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṁstenāñjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat—alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu |
divy12:310: ahaṁ tīrthyaiḥ sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṁ vidarśayiṣyāmi |
divy12:314: na tvaṁ gṛhapate ebhih ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ, api tvahaṁ tīrthyaī riddhyā āhūtaḥ |
divy12:316: sthānametadvidyate yattīrthyā evaṁ vadeyuh—nāsti śramaṇasya gautamasyottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam |
divy12:320: yathā lūhasudatto gṛhapatirevaṁ kālo rājabhrātā, rambhaka ārāmikaḥ, ṛddhilamātā upāsikā śramaṇoddeśikā, cundaḥ śramaṇoddeśaḥ, utpalavarṇā bhikṣuṇī |
divy12:321: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana utthāyāsanādekāṁsamuttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁstenāñjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat—alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu |
divy12:322: ahaṁ tīrthyaiḥ sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṁ vidarśayiṣyāmi |
divy12:327: api tu na tvaṁ tīrthyai riddhyā āhūtaḥ |
divy12:328: ahameṣāmuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṁ vidarśayiṣyāmi hitāya prāṇinām |
divy12:334: tatra bhagavān rājānaṁ prasenajitaṁ kauśalamāmantrayate—ko mahārāja tathāgatamadhyeṣate uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṁ hitāya prāṇinām? atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṁsamuttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṁ jānumaṇḍalaṁ pṛthivyāṁ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṁstenāñjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat—ahaṁ bhadanta bhagavantamadhyeṣe uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṁ vidarśayitum |
divy12:335: bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam vidarśayatu hitāya prāṇinām |
divy12:339: atha bhagavāṁstadrūpaṁ samādhiṁ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte svasminnāsane ’ntarhitaḥ pūrvasyāṁ diśi uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya caturvidhamīryāpathaṁ kalpayati tadyathā—caṁkramyate tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṁ kalpayati |
divy12:341: tejodhātusamāpannasya buddhasya bhagavato vividhānyarcīṣi kāyānniścaranti tadyathā nīlapītāni lohitānyavadātāni mañjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni |
divy12:343: adhaḥkāyaṁ prajvālayati, uparimāt kāyācchītalā vāridhārāḥ syandante |
divy12:344: yathā pūrvasyāṁ diśi evaṁ dakṣiṇasyāṁ diśīti caturdiśaṁ caturvidham ṛddhiprātihāryaṁ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṁskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy12:345: niṣadya bhagavān rājānaṁ prasenajitaṁ kauśalamidamavocat—iyaṁ mahārāja tathāgatasya sarvaśrāvakasādhāraṇā ṛddhiḥ |
divy12:346: tatra bhagavān dvirapi rājānaṁ prasenajitaṁ kauśalamāmantrayate—ko mahārāja tathāgatamadhyeṣate ’sādhāraṇāyām ṛddhyāmuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṁ hitāya prāṇinām? atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṁsamuttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṁ jānumaṇḍalaṁ pṛthivyāṁ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṁstenāñjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat—ahaṁ bhadanta bhagavantamadhyeṣe ’sādhāraṇāyām ṛddhyāmuttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṁ hitāya prāṇinām |
divy12:352: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṁ bhagavatām yadi laukikaṁ cittamutpādayanti, antaśaḥ kuntapipīliko ’pi prāṇī bhagavatah cetasi cittamājānanti |
divy12:353: atha lokottaracittamutpādayanti, tatrāgatirbhavati pratyekabuddhānāmapi, kaḥ punarvādaḥ śrāvakāṇām? atha śakrabrahmādīnāṁ devānāmetadabhavat—kimarthaṁ bhagavatā laukikaṁ cittamutpāditam? teṣāmetadabhavat—śrāvastyāṁ mahāprātihāryaṁ vidarśayitukāmo hitāya prāṇinām |
divy12:354: atha śakrabrahmādayo devā anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṁkuñcitaṁ vā bāhuṁ prasārayet, prasāritaṁ vā saṁkuñcayet, evameva śakrabrahmādayo devā anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi ca devaloke ’ntarhitāni, bhagavataḥ puratastasthuḥ |
divy12:355: atha brahmādayo devā bhagavantaṁ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā dakṣiṇaṁ pārśvaṁ niśritya niṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy12:356: śakrādayo devā bhagavantaṁ triḥ pradakṣiṇīktya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā vāmaṁ pārśvaṁ niśritya niṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy12:357: nandopanandābhyāṁ nāgarājābhyāṁ bhagavata upanāmitaṁ nirmitaṁ sahasrapatraṁ śakaṭacakramātraṁ sarvasauvarṇaṁ ratnadaṇḍaṁ padmam |
divy12:358: bhagavāṁśca padmakarṇikāyāṁ niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṁ kāyaṁ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṁ smṛtimupasthāpya |
divy12:362: evaṁ bhagavatā buddhapiṇḍī nirmitā yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanamupādāya buddhā bhagavanto parṣannirmitam(?) |
divy12:363: kecidbuddhanirmāṇāṁścakramyante, kecit tiṣṭhanti, kecinniṣīdanti, kecicchāyāṁ kalpayanti, tejodhātumapi samāpadyante, jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kurvanti |
divy12:365: gāthādvayaṁ bhāṣante— ārabhadhvaṁ niṣkrāmata yujyadhvaṁ buddhaśāsane |
divy12:369: bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā sarvaloko ’ nāvṛtamadrākṣīdbuddhāvataṁsakam yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanamupādāya antato bāladārakā api, yathāpi tadbuddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṁ ca devatānubhāvena |
divy12:371: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—tāvat pratigṛhṇīta bhikṣavo ’nupūrve sthitāyā buddhapiṇḍyā nimittam |
divy12:374: atha bhagavāṁstam ṛddhyābhisaṁskrāraṁ pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy12:375: niṣadya bhagavāṁstasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ bhāṣate— tāvadabhāsate kṛmiryāvannodayate divākaraḥ |
divy12:376: virocana udgate tu vairavyārto(?) bhavati na cāvabhāsate (5)|
divy12:378: saṁbuddhāvabhāsite tu loke na tārkiko bhāsate na cāsya śrāvakaḥ (6)|
divy12:379: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat—vidarśitaṁ bhagavatā uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam |
divy12:382: dvirapi prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat—vidarśitaṁ bhagavatā uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam |
divy12:384: evamukte tīrthyā anyonyaṁ vighaṭṭayanta evāhuh—tvamuttiṣṭha tvamuttiṣṭheti |
divy12:387: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pāñciko mahāsenāpatistasyāmeva parṣadi saṁnipatito ’bhūt saṁnipatitaḥ |
divy12:388: atha pāñcikasya yakṣasenāpateretadabhavat—ciramapi te ime mohapuruṣā bhagavantaṁ viheṭhayiṣyanti bhikṣusaṁghaṁ ceti viditvā tumulaṁ vātavarṣaṁ saṁjanayya mahāntamutsṛṣṭavān |
divy12:389: tumulena vātavarṣeṇa tīrthyāṇāṁ maṇḍapā adarśanapathe kṣiptāḥ |
divy12:390: tīrthyā hyaśanivarṣeṇa bādhyamānā diśo digbhyo vicalanti |
divy12:392: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāni |
divy12:393: bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā tasyāṁ parṣadyekavāribindur na patitaḥ |
divy12:394: ekāntaniṣaṇṇānyanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇyudānamudānayanti—aho buddhaḥ, aho dharmaḥ, aho saṁghaḥ |
divy12:396: pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā tīrthyā abhihitāh—ete yūyaṁ mohapuruṣā bhagavantaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchadhvaṁ dharmaṁ ca bhikṣusaṁghaṁ ca |
divy12:397: te niṣpalāyamānāḥ kathayanti—ete vayaṁ parvataṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmaḥ, vṛkṣāṇāṁ kuḍyānāmārāmāṇāṁ ca śaraṇaṁ gacchāmaḥ |
divy12:399: atha bhagavāṁstasyāṁ velāyāṁ gāthāṁ bhāṣate— bahavaḥ śaraṇam yānti parvatāṁśca vanāni ca |
divy12:403: yastu buddhaṁ ca dharmaṁ ca saṁghaṁ ca śaraṇaṁ gataḥ |
divy12:410: iti viditvā niṣpalāyan kathayati—aham yuṣmākaṁ śāsanasarvasvaṁ kathayiṣyāmi |
divy12:412: yaduta antavāmllokaḥ, anantaḥ, antavāṁścānantavāṁśca, naivāntavānnānantavān, sa jīvastaccharīramanyo jīvo ’nyaccharīramiti |
divy12:413: te kalahajātā viharanti bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhītā vivādamāpannāḥ |
divy12:416: paṇḍako dṛṣṭvā gāthāṁ bhāṣate—kutastvamāgacchasi muktapāṇi rathakārameṣa iva nikṛttaśṛṅgaḥ |
divy12:418: pūraṇaḥ prāha— gamanāya me samayaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ kāyasya me balavīryam na? kiṁcit |
divy12:419: spṛṣṭāśca bhāvāḥ sukhaduḥkhate me anāvṛtaṁ jñānamihārhatām (12)|
divy12:421: ācakṣva me dūṣika etamarthaṁ śītodakā kutra sā puṣkiriṇī (13)|
divy12:422: napuṁsakaḥ prāha— eṣā khalu śītā puṣkiriṇī nalinī ca virājati toyadhārā |
divy12:423: śramaṇādhama hīnāsatpuruṣa tvamimāṁ nanu paśyasi puṣkariṇīm (14)|
divy12:424: purāṇaḥ prāha— na tvaṁ naro nāpi ca nārikā tvaṁ śmaśrūṇi ca te nāsti na ca stanau tava |
divy12:425: bhinnasvaro ’si na ca cakravākah evaṁ bhavān vātahato nirucyate (15)|
divy12:426: atha pūraṇo nirgrantho vālukāghaṭaṁ kaṇṭhe baddhvā śītikāyāṁ puṣkiriṇyāṁ patitaḥ |
divy12:429: atha te nirgranthāḥ pūraṇaṁ mṛgayamāṇāḥ pratimārge gaṇikāṁ dṛṣṭvā pṛcchanti—bhadre, kaṁcit tvamadrākṣīrgacchantamiha pūraṇaṁ dharmaśāṭapraticchannaṁ kaṭacchavratabhojanam? gaṇikā prāha— āpāyiko nairayiko muktahastāvacārakaḥ |
divy12:433: gaṇikā prāha— kathaṁ sa buddhimān bhavati puruṣo vyañjanānvitaḥ |
divy12:434: lokasya paśyato yo ’yaṁ grāme carati nagnakaḥ (18)|
divy12:437: atha te nirgranthā yena śītikā puṣkiriṇī tenopasaṁkrāntāḥ |
divy12:438: adrākṣīste nirgranthāḥ pūraṇaṁ kāśyapaṁ puṣkiriṇyāṁ mṛtam |
divy12:439: kālagataṁ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ puṣkiriṇyā uddhṛtya ekānte chorayitvā prakrāntāḥ |
divy12:441: bhagavatā buddhanirmāṇo nirmito dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato muṇḍaḥ saṁghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ |
divy12:442: dharmatā khalu buddhā bhagavanto nirmitena sārdhaṁ niścayaṁ kurvanti |
divy12:443: yaṁ khalu śrāvako nirmitamabhinirmimīte, yadi śrāvako bhāṣate, nirmito ’pi bhāṣate |
divy12:447: bhagavān nirmitaṁ praśnaṁ pṛcchati, bhagavān vyākaroti |
divy12:450: bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathā abhiprasannasya āśayaṁ cānuśayaṁ ca dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhakī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yathā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni kaiściduṣma(?)gatānyadhigatāni mūrdhānaḥ kṣāntayo laukikā agradharmāḥ |
divy12:455: yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhaniṁnā dharmapravaṇā saṁghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā |
divy12:456: atha bhagavāṁstāṁ parṣadaṁ buddhaniṁnāṁ dharmapravaṇāṁ saṁghaprāgbhārāṁ vyavasthāpyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy12:458: dhanyāste puruṣā loke ye buddhaṁ śaraṇaṁ gatāḥ |
